description: 4 wolves all wearing a red cap
text:
Wolf 3:  Welcome to the Red Caps!
New wolf: Thank you! I'm very happy to join you!

description: 3 wolves wearing a red cap looking at a wolf with a scarf and huge fangs
text:
Wolf 4: Who is he?
Wolf with scarf: The new member!

description: 3 wolves wearing a red cap looking at the fourth new wolf showing his fangs
text:
Wolf 3 : Let's party!
New wolf: I'm hungry...

description: 3 wolves wearing a red cap lying on the ground with ripped clothes and the fourth wolf with a scarf and huge fangs looking at them
text:
New wolf: I'm not hungry anymore... 
Wolf 2: What happened?

description: A wolf sitting on a chair made of bones holding a glass of beverage, while three wolves are lying on the ground with ripped clothes
text:
New wolf: This was the best meal of my life.
Wolf with scarf: Welcome to the Red Caps!
